DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , control trial propose investigate effect OMT sacral base asymmetry assess ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Evaluation OMT Sacral Base Asymmetry
DOC.detailed_description: The propose prospective , randomize , control trial investigate effect osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) sacral base asymmetry assess ultrasound . The study conduct July 2016 - June 2017 data collection plan August September 2016 . Forty men woman age 20 55 year least one episode LBP past two week recruit Kirksville area . Participants randomly assign two group , control OMT use random number generator . Males female randomize separately ensure equal distribution two study group . Demographics include sex , age , body mass index ( BMI ) collect participant . All participant complete brief medical history questionnaire , receive initial palpatory assessment sacral base asymmetry , initial ultrasound evaluation sacral base asymmetry . After ultrasound assessment , control group wait another room approximately 30 minute . Participants OMT group receive OMT address sacral base asymmetry initial ultrasound assessment . Following treatment period OMT group , participant receive second ultrasound assessment sacral base asymmetry . The ultrasonographer blind whether subject receive OMT . After second ultrasound measurement , participant control group offer OMT treatment consistent OMT group .
DOC.criteria: Must experience least one episodes LBP past two week Must able lie prone 30 minute Must able tolerate OMT Prior spinal surgery Fractures Known congenital anomaly lumbar vertebra sacrum Can lie prone 30 minute Can tolerate OMT
